sentences.sContent: One parkway and three expressways meet here, andclose to 300, 000 vehicles a day are forced to reduce speed while navigating anetwork of tightly curved ramps.
sentences.sContent_eng: One parkway and three expressways meet here, andclose to 300, 000 vehicles a day are forced to reduce speed while navigating anetwork of tightly curved ramps.
sentences.sCn: 一条景观道路（parkway）和三条快速路在此交汇，近30万辆机动车每天被迫在急转的弯道（tightly curved ramps）路网中减速慢行。

trans.tranCn: 公园道路, 驾车专用道路
